                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p16.m1.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p16.m1.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> that tends to <Math mode="inline" tex="(k,A_{\mu,k})" text="open-interval@(k, A _ (list@(mu, k)))" xml:id="S6.p16.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p16.m2.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p16.m2.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p16.m2.3">k</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p16.m2.4">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p16.m2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p16.m2.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p16.m2.1">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p16.m2.2">k</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Then apply Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:p:downwards"/> to obtain a sequence of words <Math mode="inline" tex="w_{j}" text="w _ j" xml:id="S6.p16.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that the sequence <Math mode="inline" tex="(k,x_{j})" text="open-interval@(k, x _ j)" xml:id="S6.p16.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p16.m4.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p16.m4.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p16.m4.1">k</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p16.m4.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is monotone. Because <Math mode="inline" tex="I_{\mu,k}" text="I _ (list@(mu, k))" xml:id="S6.p16.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p16.m5.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p16.m5.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p16.m5.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p16.m5.2">k</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is invariant, for every <Math mode="inline" tex="j" text="j" xml:id="S6.p16.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> we have <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{\mu,k}\leq x_{j}\leq B_{\mu,k}" text="A _ (list@(mu, k)) less= x _ j less= B _ (list@(mu, k))" xml:id="S6.p16.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p16.m7.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p16.m7.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p16.m7.1">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p16.m7.2">k</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p16.m7.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p16.m7.4"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p16.m7.3">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p16.m7.4">k</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. By the sandwich rule, <Math mode="inline" tex="(k,x_{j})\to(k,A_{\mu,k})" text="open-interval@(k, x _ j) to open-interval@(k, A _ (list@(mu, k)))" xml:id="S6.p16.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p16.m8.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p16.m8.5"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p16.m8.3">k</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p16.m8.5">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p16.m8.4"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p16.m8.6"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p16.m8.4">k</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p16.m8.6">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p16.m8.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p16.m8.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p16.m8.1">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p16.m8.2">k</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> as <Math mode="inline" tex="j\to+\infty" text="j to + infinity" xml:id="S6.p16.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S6.p17">
          <p>Now assume the lengths <Math mode="inline" tex="|w^{j}|" text="absolute-value@(w ^ j)" xml:id="S6.p17.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m1.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p17.m1.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> do not tend to infinity.
Then there exists an admissible composition <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S6.p17.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> that takes the initial point <Math mode="inline" tex="(k_{0},x_{0})" text="open-interval@(k _ 0, x _ 0)" xml:id="S6.p17.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m3.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m3.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p17.m3.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p17.m3.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> exactly to the point <Math mode="inline" tex="(k,A_{\mu,k})" text="open-interval@(k, A _ (list@(mu, k)))" xml:id="S6.p17.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m4.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m4.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p17.m4.3">k</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p17.m4.4">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m4.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m4.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p17.m4.1">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p17.m4.2">k</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. But this is impossible. Indeed, otherwise the image of the point <Math mode="inline" tex="P=(k_{0},A_{\mu,k_{0}})" text="P = open-interval@(k _ 0, A _ (list@(mu, k _ 0)))" xml:id="S6.p17.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m5.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m5.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p17.m5.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p17.m5.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m5.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m5.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p17.m5.1">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.p17.m5.2">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> under <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S6.p17.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> must be below <Math mode="inline" tex="(k,A_{\mu,k})" text="open-interval@(k, A _ (list@(mu, k)))" xml:id="S6.p17.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m7.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m7.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p17.m7.3">k</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p17.m7.4">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m7.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m7.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p17.m7.1">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p17.m7.2">k</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, because the point <Math mode="inline" tex="P" text="P" xml:id="S6.p17.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is below <Math mode="inline" tex="(k_{0},x_{0})" text="open-interval@(k _ 0, x _ 0)" xml:id="S6.p17.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m9.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m9.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p17.m9.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p17.m9.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. And at the same time <Math mode="inline" tex="G(P)\in\supp\mu\subset[A_{\mu,k},B_{\mu,k}]" text="G * P element-of [\supp] * mu subset-of closed-interval@(A _ (list@(mu, k)), B _ (list@(mu, k)))" xml:id="S6.p17.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m10.5"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p17.m10.5">P</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <ERROR class="undefined">\supp</ERROR>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m10.6"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m10.7"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p17.m10.6">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m10.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m10.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p17.m10.1">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p17.m10.2">k</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p17.m10.7">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m10.3"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p17.m10.4"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p17.m10.3">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p17.m10.4">k</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
∎</p>
        </para>
      </proof>
      <para xml:id="S6.p18">
        <p>Now we can conclude the proof of Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:l:MFixed"/>. Indeed, consider the sequence of words <Math mode="inline" tex="(w^{j})" text="w ^ j" xml:id="S6.p18.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p18.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p18.m1.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> constructed in Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:p:word_constr"/>. As their lengths tend to infinity, at some point they exceed <Math mode="inline" tex="N" text="N" xml:id="S6.p18.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>; in particular, there are repeating symbols in these words.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p19">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="|w^{j}|&gt;N" text="absolute-value@(w ^ j) &gt; N" xml:id="S6.p19.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p19.m1.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p19.m1.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Passing from the end of this word to the beginning, find the first repetition of symbols. Namely, let</p>
        <equation xml:id="S6.Ex19">
          <Math mode="display" tex="w^{j}=asbsc," text="w ^ j = a * s * b * s * c" xml:id="S6.Ex19.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.Ex19.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex19.m1.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="a,b,c" text="list@(a, b, c)" xml:id="S6.p19.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p19.m2.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p19.m2.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p19.m2.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p19.m2.1">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p19.m2.2">b</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p19.m2.3">c</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are words, <Math mode="inline" tex="s" text="s" xml:id="S6.p19.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a symbol, and all the symbols in the word <Math mode="inline" tex="bsc" text="b * s * c" xml:id="S6.p19.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are different.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p20">
        <p>So the composition <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{sb}" text="f _ (s * b)" xml:id="S6.p20.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a simple return. It takes the point <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{a}(x_{0})" text="f _ a * x _ 0" xml:id="S6.p20.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p20.m2.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p20.m2.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> to a point below <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{a}(x_{0})" text="f _ a * x _ 0" xml:id="S6.p20.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p20.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p20.m3.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Meanwhile, both these points belong to <Math mode="inline" tex="\supp\mu" text="[\supp] * mu" xml:id="S6.p20.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <ERROR class="undefined">\supp</ERROR>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus for any <Math mode="inline" tex="M\geq 0" text="M &gt;= 0" xml:id="S6.p20.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> the point <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{sb}^{M}(f_{a}(x_{0}))" text="(f _ (s * b)) ^ M * f _ a * x _ 0" xml:id="S6.p20.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p20.m6.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p20.m6.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p20.m6.1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p20.m6.1.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> also belongs to <Math mode="inline" tex="\supp\mu" text="[\supp] * mu" xml:id="S6.p20.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <ERROR class="undefined">\supp</ERROR>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The sequence <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{sb}^{M}(f_{a}(x_{0}))" text="(f _ (s * b)) ^ M * f _ a * x _ 0" xml:id="S6.p20.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p20.m8.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p20.m8.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p20.m8.1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p20.m8.1.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> tends to an attracting fixed point <Math mode="inline" tex="p^{j}" text="p ^ j" xml:id="S6.p20.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of the map <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{sb}" text="f _ (s * b)" xml:id="S6.p20.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as <Math mode="inline" tex="M\to+\infty" text="M to + infinity" xml:id="S6.p20.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Hence <Math mode="inline" tex="p^{j}\in\supp\mu" text="p ^ j element-of [\supp] * mu" xml:id="S6.p20.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\supp</ERROR>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p21">
        <p>Denote by <Math mode="inline" tex="g^{j}" text="g ^ j" xml:id="S6.p21.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> the simple transition <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{sc}" text="f _ (s * c)" xml:id="S6.p21.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Note that <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{sc}(p^{j})\leq f_{asbsc}(x_{0})" text="f _ (s * c) * p ^ j less= f _ (a * s * b * s * c) * x _ 0" xml:id="S6.p21.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p21.m3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p21.m3.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p21.m3.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p21.m3.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> because <Math mode="inline" tex="p^{j}\leq f_{asb}(x_{0})" text="p ^ j less= f _ (a * s * b) * x _ 0" xml:id="S6.p21.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p21.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p21.m4.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. So the sequence <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{w^{j}}(x_{0})" text="f _ (w ^ j) * x _ 0" xml:id="S6.p21.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p21.m5.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p21.m5.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> majorizes the sequence <Math mode="inline" tex="g^{j}(p^{j})" text="g ^ j * p ^ j" xml:id="S6.p21.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p21.m6.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p21.m6.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Hence the latter also converges to <Math mode="inline" tex="(k,A_{\mu,k})" text="open-interval@(k, A _ (list@(mu, k)))" xml:id="S6.p21.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p21.m7.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p21.m7.4"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p21.m7.3">k</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p21.m7.4">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p21.m7.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p21.m7.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p21.m7.1">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p21.m7.2">k</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p22">
        <p>But there is only a finite number of simple returns and of simple transitions. By the genericity conditions any simple return has finitely many fixed points. So there are only finitely many different maps <Math mode="inline" tex="g^{j}" text="g ^ j" xml:id="S6.p22.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and points <Math mode="inline" tex="p^{j}" text="p ^ j" xml:id="S6.p22.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The sequence we have just constructed ranges over a finite set. The fact this sequence converges to <Math mode="inline" tex="(k,A_{\mu,k})" text="open-interval@(k, A _ (list@(mu, k)))" xml:id="S6.p22.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p22.m3.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p22.m3.4"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p22.m3.3">k</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p22.m3.4">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p22.m3.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p22.m3.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p22.m3.1">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p22.m3.2">k</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> implies that the point <Math mode="inline" tex="(k,A_{\mu,k})" text="open-interval@(k, A _ (list@(mu, k)))" xml:id="S6.p22.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p22.m4.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p22.m4.4"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p22.m4.3">k</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p22.m4.4">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p22.m4.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p22.m4.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p22.m4.1">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p22.m4.2">k</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> belongs to this finite set, so <Math mode="inline" tex="(k,A_{\mu,k})=g^{j}(p^{j})" text="open-interval@(k, A _ (list@(mu, k))) = g ^ j * p ^ j" xml:id="S6.p22.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p22.m5.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p22.m5.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p22.m5.3">k</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p22.m5.4">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p22.m5.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p22.m5.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p22.m5.1">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p22.m5.2">k</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p22.m5.5"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p22.m5.5">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="j" text="j" xml:id="S6.p22.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p23">
        <p>The same reasoning proves the statement for <Math mode="inline" tex="B_{\mu,k}" text="B _ (list@(mu, k))" xml:id="S6.p23.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p23.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p23.m1.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p23.m1.1">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p23.m1.2">k</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>

      <para xml:id="S6.p25">
        <p>Denote by <Math mode="inline" tex="\Phi(D)" text="Phi * D" xml:id="S6.p25.m1">

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> the <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">diffusion</text> of a set <Math mode="inline" tex="D\subset\mcI" text="D subset-of [\mcI]" xml:id="S6.p25.m2">
            <XMath>

                <XMTok meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                <ERROR class="undefined">\mcI</ERROR>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>:</p>
        <equation xml:id="S6.Ex20">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\Phi(D)=\bigsqcup_{m}\left(\bigcup_{k:\,(k,m)\,\text{admissible}}f_{k}(D\cap I%&#10;_{k})\right)," text="Phi * D = (square-union _ m)@((union _ (k colon open-interval@(k, m) * [admissible]))@(f _ k * (D intersection I _ k)))" xml:id="S6.Ex20.m1">
