                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p><Math mode="inline" tex="k,m\in\{1,\dots,N\}" text="list@(k, m) element-of set@(1, dots, N)" xml:id="S6.p25.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p25.m3.4"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p25.m3.5"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p25.m3.4">k</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p25.m3.5">m</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p25.m3.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p25.m3.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p25.m3.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.p25.m3.1">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S6.p25.m3.2">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p25.m3.3">N</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Note that a domain <Math mode="inline" tex="D" text="D" xml:id="S6.p25.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is non-strictly trapping if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="\Phi(D)\subset D" text="Phi * D subset-of D" xml:id="S6.p25.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p25.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p25.m5.1">D</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and trapping iff <Math mode="inline" tex="\Phi(D)\subset\inter D" text="Phi * D subset-of [\inter] * D" xml:id="S6.p25.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p25.m6.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p25.m6.1">D</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\inter</ERROR>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. (Note also that the domain <Math mode="inline" tex="D" text="D" xml:id="S6.p25.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is nonstrictly expelling, that is, the strip corresponding to <Math mode="inline" tex="D" text="D" xml:id="S6.p25.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:Ds"/>), is nonstrictly expelling, if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="\Phi(D)\supset D" text="Phi * D superset-of D" xml:id="S6.p25.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="superset-of" name="supset" role="RELOP">⊃</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p25.m9.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p25.m9.1">D</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. In particular, <Math mode="inline" tex="\Phi(D)" text="Phi * D" xml:id="S6.p25.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p25.m10.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p25.m10.1">D</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is not necessary a superset of <Math mode="inline" tex="D" text="D" xml:id="S6.p25.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.)</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p26">
        <p>To construct the desired trapping domain, we will first prove the following statement. For any <Math mode="inline" tex="\eps&gt;0" text="[\eps] &gt; 0" xml:id="S6.p26.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,
consider closed <Math mode="inline" tex="\eps" text="[\eps]" xml:id="S6.p26.m2">
            <XMath>
              <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-neighborhood <Math mode="inline" tex="D=\bigsqcup_{k}\overline{U_{\varepsilon}(I_{\mu,k})}" text="D = (square-union _ k)@(overline@(U _ varepsilon * I _ (list@(mu, k))))" xml:id="S6.p26.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="text" meaning="square-union" name="bigsqcup" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">⊔</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p26.m3.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p26.m3.3">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S6.p26.m3.1"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S6.p26.m3.2"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p26.m3.1">μ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p26.m3.2">k</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of the set <Math mode="inline" tex="\mcI_{\mu}" text="[\mcI] _ mu" xml:id="S6.p26.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <ERROR class="undefined">\mcI</ERROR>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then, for any sufficiently small <Math mode="inline" tex="\eps&gt;0" text="[\eps] &gt; 0" xml:id="S6.p26.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> the <Math mode="inline" tex="N+1" text="N + 1" xml:id="S6.p26.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-th image of <Math mode="inline" tex="D" text="D" xml:id="S6.p26.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is inside the interior of the union of the first <Math mode="inline" tex="N" text="N" xml:id="S6.p26.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> images:</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:N+1" xml:id="S6.E11">
          <tags>
            <tag>(11)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">11</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\Phi^{N+1}(D)\subset\inter\bigcup_{j=0}^{N}\Phi^{j}(D)." text="Phi ^ (N + 1) * D subset-of [\inter] * ((union _ (j = 0)) ^ N)@(Phi ^ j * D)" xml:id="S6.E11.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.E11.m1.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.E11.m1.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.E11.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.E11.m1.1">D</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <ERROR class="undefined">\inter</ERROR>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                          <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                            <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="display" meaning="union" name="bigcup" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">⋃</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.E11.m1.2"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.E11.m1.2">D</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p27">
        <p>Indeed, take any admissible word <Math mode="inline" tex="w=w_{1}\dots w_{N+1}" text="w = w _ 1 * dots * w _ (N + 1)" xml:id="S6.p27.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of length <Math mode="inline" tex="N+1" text="N + 1" xml:id="S6.p27.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We want to study the image <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{w_{1}\dots w_{N}}:I_{w_{1}}\to I_{w_{N+1}}" text="f _ (w _ 1 * dots * w _ N) colon I _ w _ 1 to I _ w _ (N + 1)" xml:id="S6.p27.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="[A_{\mu,w_{1}}-\eps,B_{\mu,w_{1}}+\eps]" text="closed-interval@(A _ (list@(mu, w _ 1)) - [\eps], B _ (list@(mu, w _ 1)) + [\eps])" xml:id="S6.p27.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m4.5"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m4.6"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p27.m4.5">
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m4.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m4.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p27.m4.1">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p27.m4.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p27.m4.6">
                    <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m4.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m4.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p27.m4.3">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p27.m4.4">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>; it suffices to show that both endpoints of this image belong to the interior of the right hand-side of (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:N+1"/>). Also, it suffices to consider only the images of <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{\mu,w_{1}}-\eps" text="A _ (list@(mu, w _ 1)) - [\eps]" xml:id="S6.p27.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m5.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p27.m5.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p27.m5.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p27.m5.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>: for the second endpoint, the argument is analogous.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p28">
        <p>Consider first all the intermediate images of the non-shifted endpoint <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{w_{1}\dots w_{j}}(A_{\mu,w_{1}})" text="f _ (w _ 1 * dots * w _ j) * A _ (list@(mu, w _ 1))" xml:id="S6.p28.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p28.m1.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p28.m1.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p28.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p28.m1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p28.m1.1">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p28.m1.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Note, that if at least one of them belongs to the interior of the corresponding <Math mode="inline" tex="I_{\mu,w_{j+1}}" text="I _ (list@(mu, w _ (j + 1)))" xml:id="S6.p28.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p28.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p28.m2.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p28.m2.1">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p28.m2.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, then so does the final image <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{w_{1}\dots w_{N}}(A_{\mu,w_{1}})" text="f _ (w _ 1 * dots * w _ N) * A _ (list@(mu, w _ 1))" xml:id="S6.p28.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p28.m3.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p28.m3.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p28.m3.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p28.m3.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p28.m3.1">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p28.m3.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and thus by continuity for any sufficiently small <Math mode="inline" tex="\eps" text="[\eps]" xml:id="S6.p28.m4">
            <XMath>
              <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
            </XMath>
          </Math> so does <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{w_{1}\dots w_{N}}(A_{\mu,w_{1}}-\eps)" text="f _ (w _ 1 * dots * w _ N) * (A _ (list@(mu, w _ 1)) - [\eps])" xml:id="S6.p28.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p28.m5.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p28.m5.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p28.m5.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p28.m5.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p28.m5.1">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.p28.m5.2">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p29">
        <p>Otherwise, if all the images <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{w_{1}\dots w_{j}}(A_{\mu,w_{1}})" text="f _ (w _ 1 * dots * w _ j) * A _ (list@(mu, w _ 1))" xml:id="S6.p29.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m1.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p29.m1.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p29.m1.1">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p29.m1.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> exactly coincide with the corresponding endpoints <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{\mu,w_{j+1}}" text="A _ (list@(mu, w _ (j + 1)))" xml:id="S6.p29.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m2.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p29.m2.1">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p29.m2.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, note that in the word <Math mode="inline" tex="w" text="w" xml:id="S6.p29.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> there is at least one simple return <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{w_{i}\dots w_{j-1}}" text="f _ (w _ i * dots * w _ (j - 1))" xml:id="S6.p29.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> (so that <Math mode="inline" tex="w_{i}=w_{j}" text="w _ i = w _ j" xml:id="S6.p29.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>). Let <Math mode="inline" tex="G=f_{w_{i}\dots w_{j-1}}:I_{w_{i}}\to I_{w_{i}}" text="G = f _ (w _ i * dots * w _ (j - 1)) colon I _ w _ i to I _ w _ i" xml:id="S6.p29.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be the corresponding return map. Then, the point <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{\mu,w_{i}}" text="A _ (list@(mu, w _ i))" xml:id="S6.p29.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m7.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m7.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p29.m7.1">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p29.m7.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is an attracting fixed point of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S6.p29.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> (due to the argument in the beginning of the proof), and we have <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{\mu,w_{i}}=f_{w_{1}\dots w_{i-1}}(A_{\mu,w_{1}})=f_{w_{1}\dots w_{j-1}}(A_{%&#10;\mu,w_{1}})" text="A _ (list@(mu, w _ i)) = f _ (w _ 1 * dots * w _ (i - 1)) * A _ (list@(mu, w _ 1)) = f _ (w _ 1 * dots * w _ (j - 1)) * A _ (list@(mu, w _ 1))" xml:id="S6.p29.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m9.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m9.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p29.m9.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p29.m9.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>

                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m9.7"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p29.m9.7">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m9.3"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m9.4"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p29.m9.3">μ</XMTok>

                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.p29.m9.4">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

        <p>The point <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{w_{1}\dots w_{N}}(A_{\mu,w_{1}}-\eps)" text="f _ (w _ 1 * dots * w _ N) * (A _ (list@(mu, w _ 1)) - [\eps])" xml:id="S6.p29.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m11.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p29.m11.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m11.1"/>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p29.m11.1">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.p29.m11.2">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> belongs to the interior of <Math mode="inline" tex="\cup_{j=0}^{N}\Phi^{j}(D)" text="(union _ (j = 0)) ^ N Phi ^ j * D" xml:id="S6.p29.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="union" role="ADDOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp meaning="union" role="ADDOP">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p29.m12.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p29.m12.1">D</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
So, for any admissible word <Math mode="inline" tex="w" text="w" xml:id="S6.p29.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of length <Math mode="inline" tex="N+1" text="N + 1" xml:id="S6.p29.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we have the desired inclusion, and (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:N+1"/>) is proven.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p30">
        <p>Now, denote by <Math mode="inline" tex="\Phi_{\delta}" text="Phi _ delta" xml:id="S6.p30.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> the <Math mode="inline" tex="\delta" text="delta" xml:id="S6.p30.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math><text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">-dispersed diffusion</text>:</p>
        <equation xml:id="S6.Ex23">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\Phi_{\delta}(D):=\overline{U_{\delta}(\Phi(D))}." text="Phi _ delta * D assign overline@(U _ delta * Phi * D)" xml:id="S6.Ex23.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.Ex23.m1.4"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex23.m1.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex23.m1.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex23.m1.3">D</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex23.m1.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex23.m1.2">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok name="Phi" role="UNKNOWN">Φ</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S6.Ex23.m1.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex23.m1.1">D</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>For any sufficiently small <Math mode="inline" tex="\eps&gt;0" text="[\eps] &gt; 0" xml:id="S6.p30.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, as the inclusion (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:N+1"/>) is stable under small perturbations, we have for any sufficiently small <Math mode="inline" tex="\delta&gt;0" text="delta &gt; 0" xml:id="S6.p30.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math></p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:delta" xml:id="S6.E12">
          <tags>
            <tag>(12)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">12</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\Phi_{\delta}^{N+1}(D)\subset\inter\bigcup_{j=0}^{N}\Phi_{\delta}^{j}(D)." text="(Phi _ delta) ^ (N + 1) * D subset-of [\inter] * ((union _ (j = 0)) ^ N)@((Phi _ delta) ^ j * D)" xml:id="S6.E12.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>

                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                        <XMWrap>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <ERROR class="undefined">\inter</ERROR>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">

                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                            <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="display" meaning="union" name="bigcup" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">⋃</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>

                        </XMApp>

                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                            </XMApp>
