                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <ERROR class="undefined">\om</ERROR>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex31.m1.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex31.m1.2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>

              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
<!--  %**** String Line 700 **** -->        <p>Note that <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{\om}^{(n)}" text="(A _ [\om]) ^ n" xml:id="S6.p52.m4">

                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a sequence of nested intervals, and thus <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{\om}" text="A _ [\om]" xml:id="S6.p52.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <ERROR class="undefined">\om</ERROR>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is either an interval or a single point. Also note that if some sequences <Math mode="inline" tex="\om" text="[\om]" xml:id="S6.p52.m6">
            <XMath>
              <ERROR class="undefined">\om</ERROR>

          </Math> are close enough to each other, say,</p>
        <equation xml:id="S6.Ex32">

        <p>then <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{\om}^{(n)}=A_{\om^{\prime}}^{(n)}\supset A_{\om^{\prime}}" text="(A _ [\om]) ^ n = (A _ ([\om] ^ prime)) ^ n superset-of A _ ([\om] ^ prime)" xml:id="S6.p52.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p52.m8.1">n</XMTok>

                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>

                    <XMApp>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p52.m8.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p52.m8.2">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="superset-of" name="supset" role="RELOP">⊃</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <ERROR class="undefined">\om</ERROR>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
This implies the upper-semicontinuity of <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{\omega}" text="A _ omega" xml:id="S6.p52.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. This semi-continuity, once we prove that <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{\max}" text="A _ maximum" xml:id="S6.p52.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">max</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a bony graph, will immediately imply the continuity of its graph part. The semi-continuity also implies that the set <Math mode="inline" tex="\{\om\,|\,A_{\om}\text{ is a point}\}" text="conditional-set@([\om], A _ [\om] * [ is a point])" xml:id="S6.p52.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p52.m11.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p52.m11.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined" xml:id="S6.p52.m11.1">\om</ERROR>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p52.m11.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <ERROR class="undefined">\om</ERROR>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMText> is a point</XMText>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is residual.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p53">
        <p>To prove that <Math mode="inline" tex="\Amax" text="[\Amax]" xml:id="S6.p53.m1">
            <XMath>
              <ERROR class="undefined">\Amax</ERROR>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is actually a bony graph, we use an argument similar to the <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Kudryashov2010" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Theorem 3]</cite> by Kudryashov. By the Fubini Theorem, <Math mode="inline" tex="\Amax" text="[\Amax]" xml:id="S6.p53.m2">
            <XMath>
              <ERROR class="undefined">\Amax</ERROR>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a bony graph whenever its standard measure <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathbf{s}" text="s" xml:id="S6.p53.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> (see Definition <ref labelref="LABEL:d:std"/>) is zero. For every <Math mode="inline" tex="k=1\dots N" text="k = 1 * dots * N" xml:id="S6.p53.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="dots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in I_{\mu,k}" text="x element-of I _ (list@(mu, k))" xml:id="S6.p53.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p53.m5.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p53.m5.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p53.m5.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p53.m5.2">k</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, denote by <Math mode="inline" tex="\Om_{k,x}\subset\Sigma" text="[\Om] _ (list@(k, x)) subset-of Sigma" xml:id="S6.p53.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\Om</ERROR>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p53.m6.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p53.m6.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p53.m6.1">k</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p53.m6.2">x</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok name="Sigma" role="UNKNOWN">Σ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> the slice of <Math mode="inline" tex="\Amax\cap\{\om_{0}=k\}" xml:id="S6.p53.m7">
            <XMath>
              <ERROR class="undefined">\Amax</ERROR>
              <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\om</ERROR>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by the horizontal line <Math mode="inline" tex="\Sigma\times\{x\}" text="Sigma * set@(x)" xml:id="S6.p53.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                <XMTok name="Sigma" role="UNKNOWN">Σ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p53.m8.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p53.m8.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Because <Math mode="inline" tex="F^{-1}(\Amax)=\Amax" text="F ^ (- 1) * [\Amax] = [\Amax]" xml:id="S6.p53.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p53.m9.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <ERROR class="undefined" xml:id="S6.p53.m9.1">\Amax</ERROR>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <ERROR class="undefined">\Amax</ERROR>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\Om_{k,x}" text="[\Om] _ (list@(k, x))" xml:id="S6.p53.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <ERROR class="undefined">\Om</ERROR>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p53.m10.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p53.m10.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p53.m10.1">k</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p53.m10.2">x</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the set of sequences such that</p>
        <itemize xml:id="S6.I2">

            </para>
          </item>
        </itemize>
        <p>By definition, <Math mode="inline" tex="\Amax=\sqcup_{k,x}\Om_{k,x}\times\{x\}" text="[\Amax] = square-union _ (list@(k, x)) [\Om] _ (list@(k, x)) * set@(x)" xml:id="S6.p53.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <ERROR class="undefined">\Amax</ERROR>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp meaning="square-union" role="ADDOP">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="square-union" name="sqcup" role="ADDOP">⊔</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                        <XMRef idref="S6.p53.m11.2"/>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <ERROR class="undefined">\Om</ERROR>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p53.m11.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.p53.m11.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p53.m11.3">k</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p53.m11.4">x</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p53.m11.5"/>
                      </XMApp>

            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p54">
        <p>Now we show that for all <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S6.p54.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, for all <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in I_{\mu,k}" text="x element-of I _ (list@(mu, k))" xml:id="S6.p54.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p54.m2.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p54.m2.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p54.m2.1">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p54.m2.2">k</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we have <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu(\Om_{k,x})=0" text="nu * [\Om] _ (list@(k, x)) = 0" xml:id="S6.p54.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p54.m3.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p54.m3.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <ERROR class="undefined">\Om</ERROR>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p54.m3.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p54.m3.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p54.m3.1">k</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p54.m3.2">x</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
By the Fubini Theorem, this will imply <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathbf{s}(\Amax)=0" text="s * [\Amax] = 0" xml:id="S6.p54.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p54.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <ERROR class="undefined" xml:id="S6.p54.m4.1">\Amax</ERROR>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. In a sense, we have just switched the order of integration for <Math mode="inline" tex="\Amax" text="[\Amax]" xml:id="S6.p54.m5">
            <XMath>
              <ERROR class="undefined">\Amax</ERROR>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p55">
        <p>To prove this, we cover <Math mode="inline" tex="\Om_{k,x}" text="[\Om] _ (list@(k, x))" xml:id="S6.p55.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <ERROR class="undefined">\Om</ERROR>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p55.m1.2">x</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by a disjoint union of cylinders of arbitrary small <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S6.p55.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-measure.</p>
      </para>
      <subsection xml:id="S6.SSx1">
        <title>1st generation of the cylinders</title>
        <para xml:id="S6.SSx1.p1">
          <p>By Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:cor:nonintersect"/> of Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:l:Markov-contractions"/>, there exist two words <Math mode="inline" tex="w^{(1)},w^{(2)}" text="list@(w ^ 1, w ^ 2)" xml:id="S6.SSx1.p1.m1">

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of same length <Math mode="inline" tex="L" text="L" xml:id="S6.SSx1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="w^{(i)}=w^{(i)}_{-L}\dots w^{(i)}_{-1}" text="w ^ i = (w ^ i) _ (- L) * dots * (w ^ i) _ (- 1)" xml:id="S6.SSx1.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                      <XMWrap>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that for any <Math mode="inline" tex="i=1,2" text="i = list@(1, 2)" xml:id="S6.SSx1.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.SSx1.p1.m4.1">1</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.SSx1.p1.m4.2">2</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math></p>
          <itemize xml:id="S6.I3">
            <item xml:id="S6.I3.i1">
              <tags>
                <tag>•</tag>
                <tag role="typerefnum">1st item</tag>
              </tags>
              <para xml:id="S6.I3.i1.p1">
                <p>the word <Math mode="inline" tex="w^{(i)}k" text="w ^ i * k" xml:id="S6.I3.i1.p1.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.I3.i1.p1.m1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I3.i1.p1.m1.1">i</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math> is admissible;</p>
              </para>
            </item>
            <item xml:id="S6.I3.i2">
              <tags>
                <tag>•</tag>
                <tag role="typerefnum">2nd item</tag>
              </tags>
              <para xml:id="S6.I3.i2.p1">
                <p><Math mode="inline" tex="w_{-L}^{(i)}=k" text="(w _ (- L)) ^ i = k" xml:id="S6.I3.i2.p1.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>

                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

              </para>
            </item>

              <para xml:id="S6.I3.i3.p1">
                <p><Math mode="inline" tex="f_{w^{(1)}}(I_{\mu,k})\cap f_{w^{(2)}}(I_{\mu,k})=\emptyset" text="f _ (w ^ 1) * I _ (list@(mu, k)) intersection f _ (w ^ 2) * I _ (list@(mu, k)) = empty-set" xml:id="S6.I3.i3.p1.m1">

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math>.</p>
              </para>
            </item>
          </itemize>
          <p>The latter implies that for at least one of these words, denote it by <Math mode="inline" tex="w" text="w" xml:id="S6.SSx1.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, holds <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{w}^{-1}(x)\notin I_{\mu,k}" text="(f _ w) ^ (- 1) * x not-element-of I _ (list@(mu, k))" xml:id="S6.SSx1.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="not-element-of" name="notin" role="RELOP">∉</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.SSx1.p1.m6.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.SSx1.p1.m6.3">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.SSx1.p1.m6.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.SSx1.p1.m6.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.SSx1.p1.m6.1">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.SSx1.p1.m6.2">k</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Now for every <Math mode="inline" tex="\om\in\Om_{k,x}" text="[\om] element-of [\Om] _ (list@(k, x))" xml:id="S6.SSx1.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\om</ERROR>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <ERROR class="undefined">\Om</ERROR>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.SSx1.p1.m7.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.SSx1.p1.m7.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.SSx1.p1.m7.1">k</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.SSx1.p1.m7.2">x</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> we know that <Math mode="inline" tex="\om_{[-L,-1]}\neq w" text="[\om] _ (closed-interval@(- L, - 1)) not-equals w" xml:id="S6.SSx1.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <ERROR class="undefined">\om</ERROR>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.SSx1.p1.m8.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.SSx1.p1.m8.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.SSx1.p1.m8.1">
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.SSx1.p1.m8.2">
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, so</p>
          <equation xml:id="S6.Ex33">
            <Math mode="display" tex="\Om_{k,x}\subset\bigsqcup_{s\neq w}\left\{\om_{[-L,-1]}=s\right\}." xml:id="S6.Ex33.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\Om</ERROR>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex33.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex33.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex33.m1.1">k</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>

                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
                <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                  <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="display" meaning="square-union" name="bigsqcup" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">⊔</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="true">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <ERROR class="undefined">\om</ERROR>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex33.m1.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex33.m1.4"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex33.m1.3">
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex33.m1.4">
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>The right-hand side is the 1st generation of the cylinders.</p>
        </para>
        <subsection xml:id="S6.SSx2">
          <title>The next generation of the cylinders</title>
          <para xml:id="S6.SSx2.p1">
            <p>Now we subdivide each of the 1st generation cylinders and see that</p>
            <equation xml:id="S6.Ex34">
              <Math mode="display" tex="\left\{\om_{[-L,-1]}=s\right\}=\bigsqcup_{s^{\prime}}\left\{\om_{[-2L,-1]}=s^{%&#10;\prime}s\right\}." xml:id="S6.Ex34.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="true">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <ERROR class="undefined">\om</ERROR>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex34.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex34.m1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex34.m1.1">
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex34.m1.2">
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="display" meaning="square-union" name="bigsqcup" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">⊔</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="true">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <ERROR class="undefined">\om</ERROR>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex34.m1.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex34.m1.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex34.m1.3">
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex34.m1.4">
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
            </equation>
            <p>For each <Math mode="inline" tex="s\neq w" text="s not-equals w" xml:id="S6.SSx2.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, we now have new <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{s}:=f_{s}^{-1}(x)\in I_{\mu,k}" text="x _ s assign (f _ s) ^ (- 1) * x element-of I _ (list@(mu, k))" xml:id="S6.SSx2.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.SSx2.p1.m2.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.SSx2.p1.m2.3">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.SSx2.p1.m2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.SSx2.p1.m2.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.SSx2.p1.m2.1">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.SSx2.p1.m2.2">k</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and a new word <Math mode="inline" tex="w^{\prime}\in\{w^{(1)},w^{(2)}\}" text="w ^ prime element-of set@(w ^ 1, w ^ 2)" xml:id="S6.SSx2.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.SSx2.p1.m3.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.SSx2.p1.m3.4"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.SSx2.p1.m3.3">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.SSx2.p1.m3.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.SSx2.p1.m3.1">1</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.SSx2.p1.m3.4">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.SSx2.p1.m3.2"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.SSx2.p1.m3.2">2</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="f_{w^{\prime}}^{-1}(x_{s})\notin I_{\mu,k}" text="(f _ (w ^ prime)) ^ (- 1) * x _ s not-element-of I _ (list@(mu, k))" xml:id="S6.SSx2.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="not-element-of" name="notin" role="RELOP">∉</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.SSx2.p1.m4.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.SSx2.p1.m4.3">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.SSx2.p1.m4.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.SSx2.p1.m4.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.SSx2.p1.m4.1">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.SSx2.p1.m4.2">k</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>.
Thus</p>

          <subsection labels="LABEL:p:measure_property" xml:id="S6.SSx3">
            <title>Uniform decrease of the cylinders</title>
            <para xml:id="S6.SSx3.p1">
              <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="w" text="w" xml:id="S6.SSx3.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> be any admissible word. For any cylinder <Math mode="inline" tex="C=\left\{\om_{[n_{1},n_{2}]}=u\right\}" xml:id="S6.SSx3.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="true">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <ERROR class="undefined">\om</ERROR>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.SSx3.p1.m2.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.SSx3.p1.m2.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.SSx3.p1.m2.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.SSx3.p1.m2.2">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="u" text="u" xml:id="S6.SSx3.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> being some word, denote by <Math mode="inline" tex="wC" text="w * C" xml:id="S6.SSx3.p1.m4">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> the cylinder</p>
              <equation xml:id="S6.Ex35">
                <Math mode="display" tex="wC:=\left\{\om_{[n_{1}-L,n_{2}]}=wu\right\}," xml:id="S6.Ex35.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="true">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <ERROR class="undefined">\om</ERROR>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.Ex35.m1.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.Ex35.m1.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex35.m1.1">
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex35.m1.2">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
<!--  %**** String Line 750 **** 
 %**** String Line 750 **** -->                  </XMath>
                </Math>
              </equation>
              <p>provided <Math mode="inline" tex="wu" text="w * u" xml:id="S6.SSx3.p1.m5">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> is also admissible. In other words, we concatenate <Math mode="inline" tex="w" text="w" xml:id="S6.SSx3.p1.m6">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="u" text="u" xml:id="S6.SSx3.p1.m7">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>. Obviously, <Math mode="inline" tex="wC\subset C" text="w * C subset-of C" xml:id="S6.SSx3.p1.m8">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>.</p>
            </para>
            <ERROR class="undefined">{Prop}</ERROR>
            <para xml:id="S6.SSx3.p2">
              <p>There exists <Math mode="inline" tex="0&lt;\lambda&lt;1" text="0 less lambda less 1" xml:id="S6.SSx3.p2.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> such that for any <Math mode="inline" tex="w\in\{w^{(1)},w^{(2)}\}" text="w element-of set@(w ^ 1, w ^ 2)" xml:id="S6.SSx3.p2.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.SSx3.p2.m2.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.SSx3.p2.m2.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.SSx3.p2.m2.3">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.SSx3.p2.m2.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.SSx3.p2.m2.1">1</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.SSx3.p2.m2.4">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.SSx3.p2.m2.2"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.SSx3.p2.m2.2">2</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> and for any cylinder <Math mode="inline" tex="C" text="C" xml:id="S6.SSx3.p2.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="wu" text="w * u" xml:id="S6.SSx3.p2.m4">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> is admissible, we have</p>
              <equation xml:id="S6.Ex36">
                <Math mode="display" tex="\frac{\nu(wC)}{\nu(C)}&gt;\lambda." text="(nu * w * C) / (nu * C) &gt; lambda" xml:id="S6.Ex36.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex36.m1.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex36.m1.3">
                          <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S6.Ex36.m1.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex36.m1.1">
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S6.Ex36.m1.2"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex36.m1.2">C</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>
              </equation>
            </para>
            <para xml:id="S6.SSx3.p3">
              <p>This is an obvious corollary of <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S6.SSx3.p3.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> being a Markov measure.
In fact, this proposition seems to hold for a much wider class of measures than the Markov ones. For instance, we suspect that it holds for all the measures which appear as SRB in smooth partially hyperbolic dynamics, and perhaps for all or a large class of Gibbs measures. It seems to be interesting on its own to determine the class of measures for which Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:p:measure_property"/> holds. Once one can prove Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:p:measure_property"/> for a larger class of measures, this will immediately generalize Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:t:markov_classification"/> to them.</p>
            </para>
            <subsection xml:id="S6.SSx4">
              <title>End of the proof of Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:p:Markov-bony"/></title>
              <para xml:id="S6.SSx4.p1">
                <p>On each step of the construction, we subdivide the cylinders in the same way. Because of Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:p:measure_property"/>, each next generation of cylinders has at least <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda" text="lambda" xml:id="S6.SSx4.p1.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math> part of the “bad” ones, i.e. those who eventually throw <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S6.SSx4.p1.m2">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math> out of <Math mode="inline" tex="\tilde{D}" text="tilde@(D)" xml:id="S6.SSx4.p1.m3">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math>. So each subdivision reduces the <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S6.SSx4.p1.m4">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math>-measure of the cover by at least <Math mode="inline" tex="1-\lambda&lt;1" text="1 - lambda less 1" xml:id="S6.SSx4.p1.m5">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math> times. So we are able to cover <Math mode="inline" tex="\Om_{k,x}" text="[\Om] _ (list@(k, x))" xml:id="S6.SSx4.p1.m6">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <ERROR class="undefined">\Om</ERROR>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.SSx4.p1.m6.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.SSx4.p1.m6.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.SSx4.p1.m6.1">k</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.SSx4.p1.m6.2">x</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math> with a set of an arbitrary small <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S6.SSx4.p1.m7">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math>-measure. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="\Om_{k,x}=0" text="[\Om] _ (list@(k, x)) = 0" xml:id="S6.SSx4.p1.m8">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <ERROR class="undefined">\Om</ERROR>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.SSx4.p1.m8.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.SSx4.p1.m8.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.SSx4.p1.m8.1">k</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.SSx4.p1.m8.2">x</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math>, and Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:p:measure_property"/> is proved.</p>
              </para>
              <para xml:id="S6.SSx4.p2">
                <p>∎</p>
              </para>
            </subsection>
          </subsection>
        </subsection>
      </subsection>
    </proof>
    <ERROR class="undefined">{Prop}</ERROR>
    <para xml:id="S6.p56">
      <p>The lift <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathbf{m}_{\varphi}" text="m _ varphi" xml:id="S6.p56.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of the measure <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S6.p56.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> on the graph part <Math mode="inline" tex="\Gamma_{\varphi}" text="Gamma _ varphi" xml:id="S6.p56.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="\Amax" text="[\Amax]" xml:id="S6.p56.m4">
          <XMath>
            <ERROR class="undefined">\Amax</ERROR>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is physical.

    </para>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S6.p57">
        <p>Assume that the point <Math mode="inline" tex="(\om,x)\in S_{\varphi_{1},\varphi_{2}}" text="open-interval@([\om], x) element-of S _ (list@(varphi _ 1, varphi _ 2))" xml:id="S6.p57.m1">

                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p57.m1.2">

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is such that the sequence of the time averages of its base coordinate <Math mode="inline" tex="\om\in\Sigma" text="[\om] element-of Sigma" xml:id="S6.p57.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. (Because the measure <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S6.p57.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is ergodic, this holds for the set of points of full standard measure in <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{\varphi_{1},\varphi_{2}}" text="S _ (list@(varphi _ 1, varphi _ 2))" xml:id="S6.p57.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p57.m5.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p57.m5.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.)</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p58">
        <p>Consider the sequence of time averages</p>
        <equation xml:id="S6.Ex37">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\theta_{n}:=\frac{1}{n}\sum_{j=0}^{n-1}\delta_{F^{j}(\om,x)}." text="theta _ n assign (1 / n) * ((sum _ (j = 0)) ^ (n - 1))@(delta _ (F ^ j * open-interval@([\om], x)))" xml:id="S6.Ex37.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.Ex37.m1.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex37.m1.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>

                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>

                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S6.Ex37.m1.1"/>

                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <ERROR class="undefined" xml:id="S6.Ex37.m1.1">\om</ERROR>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex37.m1.2">x</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>
