                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMCell>
                          <XMCell align="left">
                            <XMText>otherwise.</XMText>
                          </XMCell>
                        </XMRow>
                      </XMArray>
                      <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>By definition, <Math mode="inline" tex="h(m_{1}|m_{2})\geq 0" text="h * conditional@(m _ 1, m _ 2) &gt;= 0" xml:id="S7.SS1.p5.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p5.m6.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p5.m6.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="conditional" role="MODIFIEROP" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Moreover, because <Math mode="inline" tex="\log x" text="logarithm@(x)" xml:id="S7.SS1.p5.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="logarithm" role="OPFUNCTION">log</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a convex function, <Math mode="inline" tex="h(m_{1}|m_{2})=0" text="h * conditional@(m _ 1, m _ 2) = 0" xml:id="S7.SS1.p5.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p5.m8.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p5.m8.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="conditional" role="MODIFIEROP" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> iff <Math mode="inline" tex="m_{1}=m_{2}" text="m _ 1 = m _ 2" xml:id="S7.SS1.p5.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S7.SS1.p6">
          <p>A key idea of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Baxendale1989" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> is the connection between the relative entropy and the volume Lyapunov exponent for smooth invariant measures.
<ERROR class="undefined">{Prop}</ERROR>
Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu" text="mu" xml:id="S7.SS1.p6.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be an ergodic stationary measure absolutely continuous w.r.t. the Lebesgue one with a bounded density. Then</p>
          <equation labels="LABEL:e:lyap-vol-entropy" xml:id="S7.E19">
            <tags>
              <tag>(19)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">19</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="\lambda_{vol}(\mu)=-\sum\pi_{ij}\cdot\bbE h((\xi_{ij})_{*}\mu_{i}|\mu_{j})." text="lambda _ (v * o * l) * mu = - sum@((pi _ (i * j) cdot [\bbE]) * h * conditional@(xi _ (i * j) _ * * mu _ i, mu _ j))" xml:id="S7.E19.m1">

        <proof>

          <para xml:id="S7.SS1.p7">
            <p>By definition,</p>
            <equation labels="LABEL:e:lyap-rel" xml:id="S7.E20">
              <tags>
                <tag>(20)</tag>
                <tag role="refnum">20</tag>
              </tags>
              <Math mode="display" tex="\displaystyle h((\xi_{ij})_{*}\mu_{i}|\mu_{j})=\int_{M_{j}}\log\left.\frac{d(%&#10;\xi_{ij})_{*}\mu_{i}}{d\mu_{j}}\right|_{y}\,d(\xi_{ij})_{*}\mu_{i}(y)=\int_{M_%&#10;{i}}\log\left(\frac{\rho_{\mu_{j}}(\xi_{ij}(x))}{(\Jac\xi_{ij})(x)\cdot\rho_{%&#10;\mu_{i}}(x)}\right)\,d\mu_{i}(x)=\\&#10;\displaystyle=-\int_{M_{i}}\log\Jac\xi_{ij}|_{x}\,d\mu_{i}(x)+\left(\int_{M_{i%&#10;}}\log\left({\rho_{\mu_{j}}(\xi_{ij}(x))}\right)\,d\mu_{i}(x)-\int_{M_{i}}\log%&#10;\left({\rho_{\mu_{i}}(x)}\right)\,d\mu_{i}(x)\right)." text="h * conditional@(xi _ (i * j) _ * * mu _ i, mu _ j) = evaluated-at@((integral _ M _ j)@(logarithm@((d * xi _ (i * j) _ * * mu _ i) / (d * mu _ j))), y) * d * xi _ (i * j) _ * * mu _ i * y = (integral _ M _ i)@(logarithm@((rho _ mu _ j * xi _ (i * j) * x) / ((([\Jac] * xi _ (i * j) * x) cdot rho _ mu _ i) * x)) * differential-d@(mu _ i) * x) = (- evaluated-at@((integral _ M _ i)@(logarithm@([\Jac] * xi _ (i * j))), x) * d * mu _ i * x) + ((integral _ M _ i)@(logarithm@(rho _ mu _ j * xi _ (i * j) * x) * differential-d@(mu _ i) * x) - (integral _ M _ i)@(logarithm@(rho _ mu _ i * x) * differential-d@(mu _ i) * x))" xml:id="S7.E20.m1">

                  <XMDual>

            </equation>
            <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{\mu_{i}}" text="rho _ mu _ i" xml:id="S7.SS1.p7.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{\mu_{j}}" text="rho _ mu _ j" xml:id="S7.SS1.p7.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> stay for the densities of <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu_{i}" text="mu _ i" xml:id="S7.SS1.p7.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu_{j}" text="mu _ j" xml:id="S7.SS1.p7.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> respectively, and the first equality is due to the change of variables <Math mode="inline" tex="y=\xi_{ij}(x)" text="y = xi _ (i * j) * x" xml:id="S7.SS1.p7.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p7.m5.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p7.m5.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. The latter two integrals are well defined because the density <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{\mu}" text="rho _ mu" xml:id="S7.SS1.p7.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is bounded, and the manifold <Math mode="inline" tex="M" text="M" xml:id="S7.SS1.p7.m7">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is compact.</p>
          </para>
          <para xml:id="S7.SS1.p8">
            <p>Now we apply <Math mode="inline" tex="-\sum_{i,j}\pi_{ij}\cdot\bbE(\cdot)" text="- (sum _ (list@(i, j)))@((pi _ (i * j) cdot [\bbE]) * cdot)" xml:id="S7.SS1.p8.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p8.m1.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p8.m1.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p8.m1.1">i</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p8.m1.2">j</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <ERROR class="undefined">\bbE</ERROR>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p8.m1.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" xml:id="S7.SS1.p8.m1.3">⋅</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> to the right hand side of (<ref labelref="LABEL:e:lyap-rel"/>). The first summand becomes (<ref labelref="LABEL:e:lyap-vol"/>). The second one becomes zero because <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu" text="mu" xml:id="S7.SS1.p8.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is stationary (see (<ref labelref="LABEL:e:stoch_img_2"/>)):</p>
            <equation labels="LABEL:e:lyap-corr" xml:id="S7.E21">
              <tags>
                <tag>(21)</tag>
                <tag role="refnum">21</tag>
              </tags>
              <Math mode="display" tex="\displaystyle\sum_{i,j}\pi_{ij}\bbE\int_{M_{i}}\log\rho_{\mu_{j}}(\xi_{ij}(x))%&#10;\,d\mu_{i}(x)-\sum_{i,j}\pi_{ij}\bbE\int_{M_{i}}\log\rho_{\mu_{i}}(x)\,d\mu_{i%&#10;}(x)=\\&#10;\displaystyle=\sum_{j}\int_{M_{j}}\log\rho_{\mu_{j}}(y)\,d\left(\sum_{i}\pi_{%&#10;ij}\bbE(\xi_{ij})_{*}\mu_{i}\right)(y)-\sum_{i}\int_{M_{i}}\log\rho_{\mu_{i}}(%&#10;x)\,d\mu_{i}(x)=0." text="(sum _ (list@(i, j)))@(pi _ (i * j) * [\bbE] * (integral _ M _ i)@(logarithm@(rho _ mu _ j) * xi _ (i * j) * x * differential-d@(mu _ i) * x)) - (sum _ (list@(i, j)))@(pi _ (i * j) * [\bbE] * (integral _ M _ i)@(logarithm@(rho _ mu _ i) * x * differential-d@(mu _ i) * x)) = (sum _ j)@((integral _ M _ j)@(logarithm@(rho _ mu _ j) * y * d * (sum _ i)@(pi _ (i * j) * [\bbE] * xi _ (i * j) _ * * mu _ i) * y)) - (sum _ i)@((integral _ M _ i)@(logarithm@(rho _ mu _ i) * x * differential-d@(mu _ i) * x)) = 0" xml:id="S7.E21.m1">

                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok meaning="logarithm" role="OPFUNCTION" xml:id="S7.E21.m1.78">log</XMTok>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.E21.m1.79">ρ</XMTok>
                                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.E21.m1.80.1">
                                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post11"/>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                          </XMApp>
                                        </XMApp>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false" xml:id="S7.E21.m1.81">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.E21.m1.82">x</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false" xml:id="S7.E21.m1.83">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" meaning="differential-d" role="DIFFOP" xml:id="S7.E21.m1.84">d</XMTok>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.E21.m1.85">μ</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.E21.m1.86.1">i</XMTok>
                                        </XMApp>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false" xml:id="S7.E21.m1.87">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.E21.m1.88">x</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false" xml:id="S7.E21.m1.89">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP" xml:id="S7.E21.m1.90">=</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.E21.m1.91">0</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="PERIOD" xml:id="S7.E21.m1.92">.</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMCell>
                      </XMRow>
                    </XMArray>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
            </equation>
            <p>This proves (<ref labelref="LABEL:e:lyap-vol-entropy"/>). Note that because <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{\mu}" text="rho _ mu" xml:id="S7.SS1.p8.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is bounded, <Math mode="inline" tex="\int_{M_{i}}\log\rho_{\mu_{i}}(x)\,d\mu_{i}(x)&lt;+\infty" text="(integral _ M _ i)@(logarithm@(rho _ mu _ i) * x * differential-d@(mu _ i) * x) less + infinity" xml:id="S7.SS1.p8.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="logarithm" role="OPFUNCTION">log</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p8.m4.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p8.m4.1">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" meaning="differential-d" role="DIFFOP">d</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p8.m4.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p8.m4.2">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. Also <Math mode="inline" tex="\int_{M_{i}}\log\rho_{\mu_{i}}(x)\,d\mu_{i}(x)&gt;-\infty" text="(integral _ M _ i)@(logarithm@(rho _ mu _ i) * x * differential-d@(mu _ i) * x) &gt; - infinity" xml:id="S7.SS1.p8.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="logarithm" role="OPFUNCTION">log</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p8.m5.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p8.m5.1">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" meaning="differential-d" role="DIFFOP">d</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p8.m5.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p8.m5.2">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> because <Math mode="inline" tex="M" text="M" xml:id="S7.SS1.p8.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is compact. Thus both integrals are finite.
∎</p>
          </para>
        </proof>
        <para xml:id="S7.SS1.p9">
          <p>To apply (<ref labelref="LABEL:e:lyap-vol-entropy"/>), let us smooth the process <Math mode="inline" tex="\Pi" text="Pi" xml:id="S7.SS1.p9.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Namely, for any <Math mode="inline" tex="\eps&gt;0" text="[\eps] &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS1.p9.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> fix a random variable <Math mode="inline" tex="\zeta^{\eps}" text="zeta ^ [\eps]" xml:id="S7.SS1.p9.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, independent of <Math mode="inline" tex="\xi_{ij}" text="xi _ (i * j)" xml:id="S7.SS1.p9.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, taking values in <Math mode="inline" tex="\DiffIm^{1}(M)" text="[\DiffIm] ^ 1 * M" xml:id="S7.SS1.p9.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <ERROR class="undefined">\DiffIm</ERROR>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p9.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p9.m5.1">M</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, such that the following conditions hold:</p>
          <enumerate xml:id="S7.I3">
            <item xml:id="S7.I3.i1">
              <tags>
                <tag>(1)</tag>
                <tag role="refnum">1</tag>
                <tag role="typerefnum">item 1</tag>
              </tags>
              <para xml:id="S7.I3.i1.p1">
                <p>for any <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in M" text="x element-of M" xml:id="S7.I3.i1.p1.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math>, the image <Math mode="inline" tex="\zeta^{\eps}(x)" text="zeta ^ [\eps] * x" xml:id="S7.I3.i1.p1.m2">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                          <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.I3.i1.p1.m2.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.I3.i1.p1.m2.1">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math> is almost surely within the <Math mode="inline" tex="\eps" text="[\eps]" xml:id="S7.I3.i1.p1.m3">
                    <XMath>
                      <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math>-neighborhood of x</p>
              </para>
            </item>
            <item xml:id="S7.I3.i2">
              <tags>
                <tag>(2)</tag>
                <tag role="refnum">2</tag>
                <tag role="typerefnum">item 2</tag>
              </tags>
              <para xml:id="S7.I3.i2.p1">
                <p>the random variables <Math mode="inline" tex="\zeta^{\eps}(x)" text="zeta ^ [\eps] * x" xml:id="S7.I3.i2.p1.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.I3.i2.p1.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.I3.i2.p1.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math> are absolutely continuous with the density uniformly bounded by some constant <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{\eps}" text="C ^ [\eps]" xml:id="S7.I3.i2.p1.m2">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                        <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math>.</p>
              </para>
            </item>
            <item xml:id="S7.I3.i3">
              <tags>
                <tag>(3)</tag>
                <tag role="refnum">3</tag>
                <tag role="typerefnum">item 3</tag>
              </tags>
              <para xml:id="S7.I3.i3.p1">
                <p>the norms <Math mode="inline" tex="\|D\zeta^{\eps}\|,\|(D\zeta^{\eps})^{-1}\|" text="list@(norm@(D * zeta ^ [\eps]), norm@((D * zeta ^ [\eps]) ^ (- 1)))" xml:id="S7.I3.i3.p1.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                          </XMDual>

                          <XMDual xml:id="S7.I3.i3.p1.m1.2">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="norm"/>

                            </XMApp>

                              <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S7.I3.i3.p1.m1.2.1">
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S7.I3.i3.p1.m1.2.1.1"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.I3.i3.p1.m1.2.1.1">

                                  </XMWrap>

                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="parallel-to" name="||" role="VERTBAR">∥</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math> are bounded almost surely.</p>
              </para>
            </item>
          </enumerate>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S7.SS1.p10">
          <p>In particular, for the case of <Math mode="inline" tex="M" text="M" xml:id="S7.SS1.p10.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> being an interval, <Math mode="inline" tex="\zeta^{\eps}" text="zeta ^ [\eps]" xml:id="S7.SS1.p10.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> can be chosen as a composition of a contraction with factor <Math mode="inline" tex="1-\eps" text="1 - [\eps]" xml:id="S7.SS1.p10.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and a random translation by a shift that is chosen from <Math mode="inline" tex="[-\eps,\eps]" text="closed-interval@(- [\eps], [\eps])" xml:id="S7.SS1.p10.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p10.m4.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p10.m4.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p10.m4.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <ERROR class="undefined" xml:id="S7.SS1.p10.m4.1">\eps</ERROR>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with a smooth density.</p>
        </para>
<!--  %**** String Line 900 **** -->        <para xml:id="S7.SS1.p11">
          <p>Denote by <Math mode="inline" tex="\Pi^{\eps}" text="Pi ^ [\eps]" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> the stochastic skew product with <Math mode="inline" tex="\xi_{ij}^{\eps}=\xi_{ij}\ast\zeta^{\eps}" text="(xi _ (i * j)) ^ [\eps] = xi _ (i * j) ast zeta ^ [\eps]" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="ast" role="MULOP">∗</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                      <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> where <Math mode="inline" tex="\ast" text="ast" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="ast" role="MULOP">∗</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> stands for the convolution. For any <Math mode="inline" tex="\eps&gt;0" text="[\eps] &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, there exists at least one ergodic <Math mode="inline" tex="\Pi^{\eps}" text="Pi ^ [\eps]" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-stationary measure <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu_{\varepsilon}" text="mu _ varepsilon" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for <Math mode="inline" tex="\Pi^{\eps}" text="Pi ^ [\eps]" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Note that due to the choice of <Math mode="inline" tex="\Pi^{\eps}" text="Pi ^ [\eps]" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> this measure automatically has a density that does not exceed the same constant <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{\eps}" text="C ^ [\eps]" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>: indeed, this holds for one-step averaging of any initial measure due to the assumption on the laws of <Math mode="inline" tex="\zeta^{\eps}(\cdot)" text="zeta ^ [\eps] * cdot" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                    <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m10.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m10.1">⋅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, and the stationary measure is equal to its one-step diffusion.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S7.SS1.p12">
          <p>Now, for any such measure the corresponding volume random Lyapunov exponent (of the new process <Math mode="inline" tex="\Pi^{\eps}" text="Pi ^ [\eps]" xml:id="S7.SS1.p12.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>) is nonpositive, and is zero iff the measure is a.s. invariant. Indeed,</p>
          <equation xml:id="S7.Ex39">
            <Math mode="display" tex="\lambda_{vol}(\mu^{\eps};\Pi^{\eps})=-\sum_{i,j}\pi_{ij}\cdot\bbE h((\xi_{ij}^%&#10;{\eps})_{*}\mu^{\eps}_{i}|\mu^{\eps}_{j})\leq 0," text="lambda _ (v * o * l) * list@(mu ^ [\eps], Pi ^ [\eps]) = - (sum _ (list@(i, j)))@((pi _ (i * j) cdot [\bbE]) * h * conditional@(((xi _ (i * j)) ^ [\eps]) _ * * (mu ^ [\eps]) _ i, (mu ^ [\eps]) _ j)) less= 0" xml:id="S7.Ex39.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.Ex39.m1.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex39.m1.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">o</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.Ex39.m1.3.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.Ex39.m1.3.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex39.m1.3.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                              <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex39.m1.3.2">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
                              <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex39.m1.1"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex39.m1.2"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex39.m1.1">i</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex39.m1.2">j</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <ERROR class="undefined">\bbE</ERROR>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Ex39.m1.3.3"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex39.m1.3.3">
                                  <XMTok meaning="conditional" role="MODIFIEROP" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                      <XMDual>
                                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex39.m1.3.3.1"/>
                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex39.m1.3.3.1">
                                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                            <XMApp>
                                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                              <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                                              <XMApp>
                                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                              </XMApp>
                                            </XMApp>
                                            <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                                          </XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                        </XMWrap>
                                      </XMDual>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                                        <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                                      <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>and due to the properties of the relative entropy the right hand side can be zero only if <Math mode="inline" tex="(\xi_{ij}^{\eps})_{*}\mu_{i}=\mu_{j}" text="((xi _ (i * j)) ^ [\eps]) _ * * mu _ i = mu _ j" xml:id="S7.SS1.p12.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p12.m2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p12.m2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> almost surely. Now we carefully pass to the limit to obtain the same for the original process <Math mode="inline" tex="\Pi" text="Pi" xml:id="S7.SS1.p12.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="Pi" role="UNKNOWN">Π</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S7.SS1.p13">
          <p>The space of distributions on <Math mode="inline" tex="M" text="M" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is compact, so one can extract from the family <Math mode="inline" tex="\{\mu^{\eps}\}" text="set@(mu ^ [\eps])" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p13.m2.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m2.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> a weakly converging subsequence:
<Math mode="inline" tex="\mu^{\eps_{n}}\to\mu,\quad\eps_{n}\searrow 0" text="formulae@(mu ^ ([\eps] _ n) to mu, [\eps] _ n searrow 0)" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p13.m3.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p13.m3.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m3.1">
                      <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="10.0pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m3.2">
                      <XMTok name="searrow" role="ARROW">↘</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> as <Math mode="inline" tex="n\to\infty" text="n to infinity" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Then either <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda_{vol}^{\eps_{n}}\to 0" text="(lambda _ (v * o * l)) ^ ([\eps] _ n) to 0" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">o</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and thus <Math mode="inline" tex="h((\xi_{ij}^{\eps_{n}})_{*}\mu_{i}|\mu_{j})\to 0" text="h * conditional@(((xi _ (i * j)) ^ ([\eps] _ n)) _ * * mu _ i, mu _ j) to 0" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p13.m6.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m6.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="conditional" role="MODIFIEROP" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p13.m6.1.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m6.1.1">
                                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                      <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> weakly, or there exists a subsequence <Math mode="inline" tex="\eps^{\prime}_{n}\searrow 0" text="([\eps] ^ prime) _ n searrow 0" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="searrow" role="ARROW">↘</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda_{vol}^{\eps^{\prime}_{n}}\to-\alpha&lt;0" text="(lambda _ (v * o * l)) ^ (([\eps] ^ prime) _ n) to - alpha less 0" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">o</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <ERROR class="undefined">\eps</ERROR>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S7.SS1.p14">
          <p>In the latter case,</p>
          <equation xml:id="S7.Ex40">
            <Math mode="display" tex="\sum_{i,j}\pi_{ij}\int\log\Jac\xi_{ij}|_{x}\,d\mu_{i}(x)=\lim_{n\to\infty}\sum%&#10;_{i,j}\pi_{ij}\int\log\Jac\xi_{ij}^{\eps}|_{x}\,d\mu_{i}^{\eps}(x)=-\alpha&lt;0," text="evaluated-at@((sum _ (list@(i, j)))@(pi _ (i * j) * integral@(logarithm@([\Jac] * xi _ (i * j)))), x) * d * mu _ i * x = evaluated-at@((limit _ (n to infinity))@((sum _ (list@(i, j)))@(pi _ (i * j) * integral@(logarithm@([\Jac] * (xi _ (i * j)) ^ [\eps])))), x) * d * (mu _ i) ^ [\eps] * x = - alpha less 0" xml:id="S7.Ex40.m1">

            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>and hence for at least one ergodic component <Math mode="inline" tex="\tilde{\mu}" text="tilde@(mu)" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu" text="mu" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> (note that <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu" text="mu" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is not necessarily ergodic!) we have</p>
          <equation xml:id="S7.Ex41">
            <Math mode="display" tex="\lambda_{vol}(\tilde{\mu})=\sum_{i,j}\pi_{ij}\int\log\Jac\xi_{ij}|_{x}\,d\mu_{%&#10;i}(x)\leq-\alpha&lt;0." text="lambda _ (v * o * l) * tilde@(mu) = evaluated-at@((sum _ (list@(i, j)))@(pi _ (i * j) * integral@(logarithm@([\Jac] * xi _ (i * j)))), x) * d * mu _ i * x less= - alpha less 0" xml:id="S7.Ex41.m1">
              <XMath>
